programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep36
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep224
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Han Ming, a prosecutor, faces a whirlwind of complications in his work and family lives: his son's clash with another student in school and his wife's intervention, as well as the strained partnerships at work. Amidst it all, a critical case challenges his sense of righteousness, and he decides to gamble everything to seek fairness and justice.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: The sequel to "Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons", this happens after Monkey King has gained enlightenment and is Tang San Zang's disciple. Tang, Monkey King, Sandy and Pigsy continue their journey to the West, where they have to fight and eliminate demons while dealing with their own changes, putting their bond to the test.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: The sequel to "Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons", this happens after Monkey King has gained enlightenment and is Tang San Zang's disciple. Tang, Monkey King, Sandy and Pigsy continue their journey to the West, where they have to fight and eliminate demons while dealing with their own changes, putting their bond to the test.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Love is the only Answer
programme.desc: At Bo and Cheong wedding reception, the projected was initially showing their journey of love, but suddenly a flash of a clip of Cheong and a sexy girl being intimate came up. Bo calmly ran up to the stage and announced that the wedding is cancelled. The incident rapidly became a hot topic on the internet. Within a year, back to being single again, Bo and the living life happily Cheong maintains a good relationship. One day, Cheong decided to play with love and took Bo to participate in a swinging party. The conservative Bo initially wanted to leave, but after being bribed by Cheong, she helpless and stayed. At the swinging party, the two encounter Kit and his wife Man Lai. The 4 of them develop a romantic and hot relationship... At another wedding reception, when the projector plays the groom and bride's heartwarming clips, a flash of another clip that does not want to be seen comes up...

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Han Ming, a prosecutor, faces a whirlwind of complications in his work and family lives: his son's clash with another student in school and his wife's intervention, as well as the strained partnerships at work. Amidst it all, a critical case challenges his sense of righteousness, and he decides to gamble everything to seek fairness and justice.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his Crazy Lo Han Fist improves with every fight.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynastys Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the masters granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Shaolins Hung falls in love with Fang while escaping the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hungs son creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Honey Bunny In Spacefootball Ep1
programme.desc: Honey, Bunny and the gang engage in an exciting game of football.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 1 - Join Ryan and his team as they explore the city of Zurich, and then set out from Vaduz in Liechtenstein to embark on this mammoth trek towards Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The New Wild - Mammals have mastered every environment on Earth, but today the planet is changing faster than ever. Mammals must change with it to have a chance of survival in this, the new wild.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A New Perspective - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Michigan - Bass is big in America, so Robson is heading to Michigan for the coveted Bass Grand Slam. He's on one of the best bass fishing lakes in America, but is it enough to secure the prize?

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The lion pride males are injured and the mothers with cubs are left vulnerable after an attack; Xudum, the female leopard, takes risks to find a mate.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The first leg of Anton and Giovanni's Sicilian road trip begins in the port town of Sciacca. From there, it takes in Greek architecture, octopus fishing and a tango festival.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Law and Order - In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Outbreak! - The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Deadly Rivals - Enter the world of a wild dog pack whose bountiful hunting grounds are threatened when a clan of spotted hyenas moves in nearby. The vulnerable pups start to go hungry as the scavenging rivals steal their food and eventually raid their den.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Summer to Remember - Dive into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. Shadow the team as they fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and see vet Karina use a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep5

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Camouflage and Colouration - Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme - Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dilla and Delilah - The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.desc: A Prickly Problem - Join vets Emily and Martine in the OR, where Dolly the koalas spaying surgery takes a scary turn. Aid a run-over echidna with vet Nigel, see rescue officer Chantelles slick fix for a snared lizard, and probe a possible birdnapping with vet Karina.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: City of Riches - Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the worlds only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose, and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Smith family embark upon a mammoth declutter. Stacey and the team challenge them to let go of half of their possessions, so that they can beautifully reorganise their life and home.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Two rival architects use virtual reality to pitch for the commission to rebuild a Brighton home. But will the winning design result satisfy the competing desires of its owners?

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Greens Week - This week on The Great South African Bake off, the bakers are celebrating vegetables through a range of delicious challenges. Siba and Paul task them with vegetarian galettes, a traditional Turkish flatbread, and vegetable showstoppers.

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In the coastal city of Preveza, Rick goes prawn fishing and follows in the footsteps of Lord Byron to visit the city of Messolonghi. He also cooks stuffed peppers and tomatoes and souvlaki.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep5

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Pawston \ Ruff Day on the Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep57
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lord Shark - King Julien's submarine sinks in the ocean; Clover & Sage go on quests to test their patience and rage; Mort leads an escape but a spy is in the midst

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep58
programme.desc: Bad Year Blimp - King Julien and his team ride sharks to an Island; Clover and Sage get a map that leads to the wisdom they seek; Mort hides in Junk Harbor

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep29
programme.desc: Ugly Duckling - As Puss readies a team to defend San Lorenzo, he's shocked to discover his mentor El Guante Blanco has taken on the Ugly Ducking as his newest protg.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: The Banana Bread Burglar / Finding Meow Meow - When the banana bread Harper leaves out for Eden is stolen, the Dew Drops create a sting operation to catch the thief. / When Captain Meow Meow gets a splinter in his paw and hears the word "vet," he flees. Now it's up to the Dew Drops to find Captain Meow Meow and get that splinter out.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep29
programme.desc: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew - When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep13

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep25
programme.desc: The Trial of Mr. Ping - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep26
programme.desc: Baddie Issues - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7

programme.desc: Tortools - The Dinotrux find a nest of Tortool eggs. The hatchlings think Dozer is their mother and proceed to wreak havoc, painting everything in sight.

programme.desc: A Wanderer's Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep519
programme.desc: The Treat Thief - Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Hamsters Gone Viral / The Thunder Maker - The hamsters try to compete with popular animal videos online and end up going viral. // Mondo must choose between his new superpower (causing thunderstorms) and his friend.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Pups Get a Rubble / Pups Save a Walrus - We see a flashback of how Rubble became a member of the Paw Patrol! // When Wally the Walrus gets tangled in an old fishing net, Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to get him to the surface and back to shore safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bunnies / Puptacular - Farmer Yumi's carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help. // Katie is excited to be entering one of the Paw Patrol pups into a puppy grooming competition "Puptacular" in the next town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups Save a Basketball Game - Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdingers Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed / The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. // Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Friendaversary Adventure / Swiper's Birthday Surprise - Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. On the way to the party, Swiper attempts to swipe his own surprise present.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Great Shark Hunter - Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks - Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Sharkdog Home Alone - When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest, Canada - Glitch travels to Ontario to find a new teddy bear, but things start to go very wrong...

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Map Readers - Glitch races the Go Jetters across the Academy to find the lost G.O. Dome of the Ancients.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Mr Monkeyjocks - Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Andy and the Bobwhite Quails - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to North America to discover the creatures living in the wild spaces between crops. Along the way, they meet some bobwhite quails.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Soil - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about soil.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Buccaneer Cheer - Sandy and Seaweed are enjoying singing the Swashbuckle song but Captain Captain isn't very happy and suggests they write something themselves, with disastrous results.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Mountain Badge - The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Central Park, New York - Glitch visits Broadway, while the Go Jetters tackle a huge cloud of smog in Central Park.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep21
programme.desc: A New Arrival - When Thomas finds out that the Earl's Technology Fair will bring new inventions to Sodor, he fears the Sodor engines will be replaced by new technology.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Museum - Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dog Loves Snark - Dog and Pug meet a pirate captain on a desert island who is hunting the Snark.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep54
programme.desc: Parcel Puzzle - When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep28
programme.desc: The News Badge - After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep17

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Lychee - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's love and peace symbol, Lychee, performing his song - "All You Need is Lychee!"

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grape Kids' Super Camp - Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Operation Kiwi - Supertato, Carrot and Tomato are exploring in the plant aisle when they hear a strange noise. They follow the noise and meet the famous Kiwi the Explorer, who needs their help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep71
programme.desc: Didgeridoo - Tinky Winky learns to play the didgeridoo. The Teletubbies do a special didgeridoo Tubby Phone Dance. Tiddlytubby Ping loves the didgeridoo too!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep21

programme.desc: We revisit Ukrainian musicians Alek and Vadym in Nagasaki as they create a music video to express their prayer for peace, and meet Yuliya, also from Ukraine, who works at a restaurant in Kanagawa.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #32 How can I get to the Ninja Museum? / If you want to ask for directions, say the name of your destination, then "made doo ittara ii desu ka."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Culture Crossroads comprises several regular programs with the theme of creating a multicultural society. They look at international exchange programs and give tips on disaster preparedness.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep702
programme.desc: Fighter Focus: Benoit St Denis, Locked In: Kevin Holland, Take 5: Molly McCann - Born into a military family, Benoit Saint-Denis joined the French special forces keen to fight for his country; after an exceptional military career he continues to represent France but on a different battlefield; the Octagon. Kevin Holland explains how trash talk and verbal warfare can be used as a weapon inside and outside the Octagon. UFC strawweight Molly McCann lists her top 5 spinning KOs of all time.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Adesanya vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon is back in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, on February 1 for a UFC Fight Night event featuring the return of a former middleweight champion with his sights on regaining his crown. But before Israel Adesanya gears up for a title run, he has to get by surging contender Nassourdine Imavov. One of the most dominant champions of his era, Adesanya aims to get his 2025 campaign off to a winning start against Imavov, who has won three in a row leading up to the biggest fight of his career. In the co-main event, Middleweight sensation Shara Bullet Magomedov faces off with veteran star Michael Venom Page in a showdown of elite strikers.
